greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n^2 into parts smaller than n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..320
maple: a := proc (n) local G, Gser: G := 1/(product(1-x^j, j = 1 .. n-1)): Gser := series(G, x = 0, n^2+5): coeff(Gser, x, n^2) end proc: 1, seq(a(n), n = 1 .. 23); # _Emeric Deutsch_, Jun 20 2009
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[n==0, 1, If[i<1, 0, b[n, i-1] + If[i>n, 0, b[n-i, i]]]]; a[n_] := b[n^2, n-1]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 30}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 30 2015, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 10 2009
